Faculty.title: Faculty
Faculty.description: Represents a faculty member in the system.

empId.description: Employee ID of the faculty member.

userId.description: The associated user ID from Firebase Authentication.

name.description: Full name of the faculty member.

email.description: Email address of the faculty member.

department.description: The department the faculty member belongs to.

role.description: Role of the user, e.g., 'faculty' or 'admin'.

slotDatetime.description: The start date and time of the slot.

durationMinutes.description: The duration of the slot in minutes.

isBooked.description: Whether the slot is currently booked.

bookedBy.description: The empId of the faculty member who booked the slot.

updatedAt.description: The last time the slot was updated.

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log
ActivityLog.description: Logs actions performed by users in the system.

performedBy.description: The empId of the user who performed the action.

details.description: A JSON object containing details about the action.

/slots/{slotId}.description: Stores all available and booked time slots.

/activity_logs/{logId}.description: Stores an audit trail of all actions.
